atk_abil: Normal Attack: Throws a spear that slows the enemy.
Skill Attack: Launch barrage of feathers to slow and knock-back enemies.
Special Ability 1: Increases the basic speed of game by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Increases elf unit movement speed by 3% and attack range by 4%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: When included in team, elf's secret skill chance increases by 2%. (However, the increase by Hippogriffs cannot exceed 30%.)

Legend of Ancient Forest: When elf's secret skill is cast, this has a chance to pass 2 stages at a time. (This chance increases by 2% for each 5-star and 5% for each 6-star, but this only applies when they are included in the team. (Not applied when in Time Shop and cannot exceed 50%.))
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Throws spear that slows enemies.
Skill Attack: Launch barrage of feathers to slow and knock-back enemies.
Special Ability 1: Increases the basic speed of game by 8%.
Special Ability 2: Increases elf unit movement speed by 6% and attack range by 7%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: When included in team, elf's secret skill chance increases by 5%. (However, the increase by Hippogriffs cannot exceed 30%.)

Legend of Ancient Forest: When elf's secret skill is cast, this has a chance to pass 2 stages at a time. (This chance increases by 2% for each 5-star and 5% for each 6-star, but this only applies when they are included in the team. (Not applied when in Time Shop and cannot exceed 50%.)

buffs.description: Increases the chance of elf's secret skill (not applied from Time Shop)(5-star 2%, 6-star 5%, Max 30%).
buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill 2

buffs.description: When elf's secret skill is cast, this has a chance to pass 2 stages at a time (not applied from Time Shop)(5-star 2%, 6-star 5%, Max 50%).
buffs.name: Legend of Ancient Forest
